title: Taboo: I Shouldn't Want This: Her Need For Him
description: A family holiday with her dad, his new wife and her son Matt is Michaela’s worse nightmare.Or is it?Matt certainly pushes her buttons but there is something about him that drives her naughty side wild.So when Matt makes it clear what he wants Michaela finds she can’t resist!This erotic short story contains hot, panty-wetting action and is definitely for adults only!
author: Sarah Jayne Masters
